name: Golem Groove
description:
Trapped in a perilous dungeon, a wizard transfers his soul into a stone golem to help him escape.  The two bodies are linked by music, moving and exchanging control to the beat.  Keep the rhythm and guide them to the exit!

Music, sound, art, and level design by Darian Neufeld

Code and implementation by Navras Kamal

Entry for GMTK 2021, with the theme Joined Together.
